title: Oil Markets on Edge as Geopolitical Risk Counters Weak Fundamentals
description: Light Crude Oil Futures (WTI) ended Thursday at $59.67, up $1.12 on the week, a 1.91% advance that unfolded within a range of $58.28 to $60.02. The narrow climb masked a week defined by sharp swings as traders weighed expanding geopolitical risk against persi…
